title: leagueClient.exe Bad Image bugsplat.dll
body: Hi, I have a problem! I was cleaning out my computer, and I don't know if I accidentally deleted a League of Legends file. But every time I click on the LoL Icon on my desktop, a windows pops up with "leagueClient.exe Bad Image bugsplat.dll". I don't know what it means. But now, I can't launch or play league. I am going to re-install League again. Thanks to whoever helps me!

replies.body: Find the file which shows in error for me it was api-ms-win-core-localization-l1-2-0.dll, then i cut the file and launched the client it started repairing the file and then it worked.
this is happing to me what do i do
It definitely sounds like something with your game files have gone wrong or missing.  Reinstalling should resolve this, but let me know if you still have any issues!
Hello, I have an issue. The download was about to finish, then it froze and crashed! I believe I will never play league again :(. I have restart all over now. Please help.

If you were at a high percent but crashed, possibly with an Unspecified Error, then your connection might be having problems.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that your network has a strong connection to the patching servers.  I hope that helps!
Hi, again. League was able to download successfully! Thanks! And one more thing, what can be the causes of the Client freezing? My client is always freezing now, I can't get into games. Thanks!
When you say client, where exactly do you mean?  When and where is the freezing happening specifically?  Can you interact with anything?  Let me know!
I got a new graphics card. Fixed, thanks!
Alright thanks. I am currently using Wi-Fi, but today I am thinking to set up a wired connection. (Ethernet). I'll just let the game download, thanks! :)
I am in the process re-installing right now, I will contact you again if I have any other issues. Thanks!
